item.description:
@dipinit wrote:

Oh right, thanks it’s so late (for me) I haven’t even thought about this.

item.title: Commands in specific Regions
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“dipinit, post:1, topic:536385”]Hello,
I’d like to create a command that would work only if the player is standing in a certain region… (I’m using a 718 Matrix revision)

For the algorithm, it must be something like this:

if(cmd[0].equalsIgnorecase("special")) { if(player coords are X,Y) // or from X1,Y1 to X10,Y15 do stuff; else player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You can't use this."); }

Thanks in advance[/quote]’

Look at how the creator of the server made the wilderness pvp, use that same thing for this

Read full topic

item.title: Commands in specific Regions
item.dc:creator: @dipinit dipinit
item.description:
@dipinit wrote:

Hello,
I’d like to create a command that would work only if the player is standing in a certain region… (I’m using a 718 Matrix revision)

For the algorithm, it must be something like this:

if(cmd[0].equalsIgnorecase("special")) { if(player coords are X,Y) // or from X1,Y1 to X10,Y15 do stuff; else player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You can't use this."); }

Thanks in advance
